channel.title: I want to play a source by myself
channel.description: I know this may sound weird, but how would I set up the source so I can play it by myself? Do I still need Apache, Wamp, and JDK?

item.title: I want to play a source by myself
item.dc:creator: @lolwut69 lolwut69
item.description:
@lolwut69 wrote:

[quote=“Led_Zeppelin, post:4, topic:257431”]Okay, can I still use JDK for a 24 bit graphics card? All I can find is JDK for a 32 bit or 64 bit >.<[/quote]24 bit graphics card?.. There’s no such thing as a 24 bit graphics card, plus you’re thinking of 32 bit or 64 bit operating systems, not graphics card.

Read full topic

item.title: I want to play a source by myself
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“Led_Zeppelin, post:1, topic:257431”]I know this may sound weird, but how would I set up the source so I can play it by myself?
Do I still need Apache, Wamp, and JDK?[/quote]

Yes you still need wamp, jdk, and apache

All you need todo is set the ip to ‘localhost’ lets you play by yourself

Read full topic

item.title: I want to play a source by myself
item.dc:creator: @Goran Goran
item.description:
@Goran wrote:

[quote=“Led_Zeppelin, post:1, topic:257431”]I know this may sound weird, but how would I set up the source so I can play it by myself?
Do I still need Apache, Wamp, and JDK?[/quote]
no all u need is to make no-ip… download source do inviroment variables(probaly JDK) and log on with ip as 0.0.0.0

Read full topic
